Rat Trap wanted desperately to make a move. But he knew if he did that now,=
 it would blow Windlord and his own cover.  He did not want to risk it.  Bu=
t he could see several tiny wires, and quietly nibbles on them to see what =
little good that could do.  

Out on the battle field, Tucson concentrates,=
 knowing what kind of attack was enveloping his comrades and himself.  He h=
ad once learned from his sensai, how to clear his mind, and focus on the ta=
sk at hand.  Clearing his directory... Was that the way to lift the fog tha=
t Phobia had beset upon them?  Night Shift was the only one who could read =
his thoughts, due to the fact that he too, had the same sensai as Tucson.  =
He catches on quickly, and takes a deep breath, clearing his mind of everyt=
hing.  

As Tucson clears his mind, he could feel the breath of those many =
heads hitting his body from all angles.  Based on this information, he atte=
mpts to backfist one of the heads he feels behind him.  And in pure ninja f=
ashion, he keeps quiet.

Night Shift now focuses on his job at hand, and dr=
aws a ninjitsu blade from the back of his left shoulder. 

Tucson then look=
s to everyone.  He sends a silent com to Kup and everyone else.

"Comrades,=
 this is an attack of the mind.  Mind over matter.  If you clear your minds=
 you may find it easier to overcome the attack beset by Phobia.  Just a lit=
tle something Night Shift and I learned from our Sensai, Master Yokitron, v=
orns ago."

Now completely focused, Night Shift nodds, and his expression c=
hanges to Determination rather than fear.

"Let's do this.  Kup, Talon, we =
swing this, if Tucson says we can then we can!  We're Autobots, not cowards=
!  We gotta remember Who we are and what we stand for!"
